mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.title, t1.cover, t1.price, t1.lesson_num as lessonNum , t2.description, t3.name as teacherName, t4.title as subjectL1Title, t5.title as subjectL2Title from edu_course as t1 left join edu_course_description as t2 on t1.id = t2.id left join edu_teacher as t3 on t1.teacher_id = t3.id left join edu_subject as t4 on t4.id = t1.subject_id left join edu_subject as t5 on t5.id = t1.subject_parent_id where t1.id = #{courseId};
